snippet.title: Auto RiskRisk - Release Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Release gameplayer trailer for the auto battler Auto RiskRisk developed by Parrexion Games.

This showcases the main gameloop together with the basic actions you will perform when building your teams and then fighting the opponents.

Wishlist the game on Steam now!
